Key Arguments: Individuals have a basic human right to think critically and discern information for themselves.
All information should be freely available from multiple sources to form truly informed opinions.
The proposed legislation would lead to censorship and restrict freedom of thought and speech.
The COVID-19 pandemic is cited as an example where information was controlled by those with vested interests.
A governing body deciding what is misinformation is equated to propaganda and enslavement.
Notable Quotes: Forming a governing body that has the right to decide, for its people, what is deemed worthy of being called information and what THEY perceive is misinformation, equates to nothing more than enslaving the population with more of the lies and blatant propaganda that has become so prevalent in mainstream media today.
What on Godâ€™s green Earth has happened to our right to think and decide for ourselves ??
This is just another form of censorship to shut down critical thinking and freedom of speech.
